entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.7°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023
